data.title: Seven Stories Press
data.meta_description: Publishes books of top authors, non-fiction (social justice, human rights and radical activism) and alternative health, women's health, and popular culture.
data.text:
Every month, your favorite BroadwayWorld-Award Winning senior citizen-redneck-lesbian welcomes NYC's greatest talent to Leola's Lady Land Lounge â€” a LIVE talk show at the Green Room 42! Singers, dancers, actors and artists of all kinds join Leola inside the rainbow-cladded walls of her Lady Land Lounge. It's one part variety show, one part chat show, and oodles of laughs.

On November 18, Leola welcomes Broadway legend Amy Spanger; triple threat cutie Ben Bogen; and award-winning novelist/playwright Kia Corthron. We're gonna laugh, we're gonna learn somethin' and we're gonna show some gratitude this Thanksgiving season for such talented superstars!

Tickets start at just $19! For information: bit.ly/ladylandlounge

GR42 COVID-19 Policy

All guests are required to be fully vaccinated in order to enter our venue. For help providing proof of vaccination, we recommend NY State Excelsior Pass.

Our staff is required to be masked and they are fully vaccinated whenever possible.

NOTE: This event begins at 7pm EST
